title: Present Tension
description: A routine away mission to a trading planet turns deadly when Janeway puts herself at risk to protect a former Borg. While Janeway and Lynne cope with the aftermath, Seven of Nine adapts to a newcomer â€” and the realization that for the first time since her own severance from the Collective, her mind is no longer silent.77,000 words
author: Fletcher DeLancey
